unit.creator: Philodemus || Ranocchia, Graziano et Vassallo, Christian
unit.title: De rhetorica || Col. 65 PHerc. 1004 || Diplomatic Apparatus

dsl.content: 1 ]ϲου[ +1 (γ, π, τ) 2 ]ενο[ +1 sub lineam apex, (ϲ, ι), sin. sup. horiz. apicata 3 ]ων[ +1 inf. vest., inf. vest. 4 ]ον[][ +1 inf. apex, inf. vert. apicata, sin. inf. horiz. 5 ]ϲοιτο[ +1 (π, η, ν) 6 ]ηγνο[ +1 inf. apex vel arcus 7 ]τιφερε +1 sin. sup. apex 8 ]δεπρ[ +1 (α, λ, μ) 9 αλθειϲ[ +1 sin. vert., sin. inf. vest. 10 ]ν[]μουϲικω[ +1 dext. med. desc. 11 ]υϲποιειν +1 12 ανϲυϲουφ[ +1 13 [] +1 inf. arcus, inf. vert ω[₍₎]εινο +1 dext. inf. desc.vel arcus 14 μ[]δυϲωμενοι[ +1 (π, τ) 15 ρ[]ενοϲδεϲ[ +1 (μ, λ, ϲ), (τ, π), inf. vert., (ϲ, ε), sup. desc. vel vert. 16 ]ηβαν[ +1 inf. vest., (ε, θ) 17 ]ικ[ +1 dext. inf. horiz. vel arcus 18 ][₍₎]γ +1 sup. arcus, dext. sup. arcus
